title: Data science and Ethereum
description:
Share insights on how we collect and utilize consensus layer data from devnets, testnets, and mainnet:
- Tools used to extract data from the Ethereum network
- Our current dataset: https://ethpandaops.io/data/xatu/
- Examples of past analyses and their impact on decision-making
- The importance of data science for research, Ethereum improvements and understanding the network
- A demo on interacting with the dataset and how to get started
- Future plans and ways to get involved
